sourcesContent: import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { ToastService } from 'angular-toastify'; import { AuthService } from './auth/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor(public authService: AuthService, private toastService: ToastService) { this.toastService.success('Toastify is working!');} title = 'pg-admin'; isSidebarToggled: boolean = false; isContentFullWidth: boolean = false; toggleSidebar() { this.isSidebarToggled = !this.isSidebarToggled; } }
